description:
She recently announced she would not be returning for a second season of The Originals. 她最近宣布不会再回归《初代吸血鬼》第二季了。

But Australian actress Claire Holt appeared somewhat hesitant to leave her fiery character behind as she posed for a sultry photo shoot with US magazine Glamoholic.但是这位澳大利亚女演员克莱尔·霍尔特在为美国杂志《Glamoholic》拍摄一组性感照片时，也透露了对离开她的角色还是很犹豫的。

It was revealed earlier this month the stunning actress would be leaving the hit CW drama, which is a spinoff of The Vampire Diaries.之前就有消息透露这位光彩四射的演员将离开CW热门剧集《初代吸血鬼》，也就是《吸血鬼日记》的衍生剧。

And speaking to the magazine about her life after The Originals, Claire said she would be looking for new challenges.谈到她离开《初代》后的打算，她说会寻找一些新的挑战。

'I would love to continue to challenge myself by trying different things. Action, Drama, Comedy,' she said, 'I would be grateful to do any and all of it if someone is kind enough to hire me!'“我很乐意继续挑战不一样的东西。动作，戏剧，喜剧，”她说，“如果有人愿意雇我，我很乐于做更多尝试。”

'I have such a wonderful time on The Originals though, because I get to play Rebekah in so many different periods. I’m a little spoiled.'“虽然我在《初代吸血鬼》中度过了很快乐的时光，但是因为我扮演了太多时期的瑞贝卡，有点被宠坏了。”

Even though the actress reportedly quit the show, a source told Buzzfeed that the door remains open for guest appearances.尽管报道都称这位演员退出了剧集，但是知情人士告诉《Buzzfeed》，友情客串的大门永远为她敞开。

title: 《初代吸血鬼》瑞贝卡不再回归

description:
Anne Hathaway stunned passerby in an elegant orange-and-purple dress with an exotic twist while at the Rio 2 premiere in Miami Beach on Friday.安妮·海瑟薇在星期五的《里约大冒险2》首映式上身穿一件优雅的橘紫相间、带有异域风格的礼裙惊艳亮相。

Hathaway, 31, has lent her voice for the role of Jewel in the Rio sequel, an animated film that follows a family of city birds that move to the Amazon jungle to reconnect with their wild roots.31岁的海瑟薇在《里约大冒险2》续集中，给角色珠儿配音。这部动画电影叙述了住在城市里的鹦鹉一家子迁入险象环生的亚马逊流域，学习过野外鸟儿生活的故事。

Hathaway's strapless gown hugged her slender and narrow midsection, and flipped out to reveal an orange interior.海瑟薇的抹胸礼服勾勒出她纤细的腰部曲线，并在此处裙子里层的橙色被翻转了出来。

The bottom piece flowed out, revealing her trim hips, before ending at her knees.裙尾恰好到海瑟薇膝部。裙子的下半身剪裁很流畅，材质也很有垂感，很好地修饰了海瑟薇的臀部曲线。

She teamed the ensemble with a pair of dainty and bold pink high heels that revealed just a touch of her toes at the center.她搭配了一双精美的粉色高跟鞋。鞋子很有特点，仅露中间部分脚趾。

Hathaway combed her short hairdo in a sleek and chic mane.她当天还把自己的一头短发打理得又时尚又高贵。
